com.dhemery.core
Class Requiring<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.dhemery.core.Named
      com.dhemery.core.NullSafeUnaryOperator<T>
          com.dhemery.core.Requiring<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of operand
All Implemented Interfaces:
UnaryOperator<T>
public class Requiring<T>
extends NullSafeUnaryOperator<T>

An operator that yields its operand if it satisfies some criteria. If the operand does not satisfy the criteria, the operator returns null.

Constructor Summary
Requiring(org.hamcrest.Matcher<? super T> criteria)
          Create an operator that returns its operand if it satisfies some criteria.

Method Detail

operateOnNonNull

protected T operateOnNonNull(T operand)
Description copied from class: NullSafeUnaryOperator
Operate on the operand, which is guaranteed not to be null.

This implementation returns its operand. Override this method to operate on the non-null operand.

Overrides:
operateOnNonNull in class NullSafeUnaryOperator<T>
Parameters:
operand - the non-null operand to operate on
Returns:
the result of applying the operator to the operand

@Expression
